duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain relationships with departmental and technical decision makers in assigned accounts.
Differentiate and convey compelling value propositions for product/solutions/services offerings.
Forecast orders and sales, create territory/account plans, and build business relationships.
Maintain market and competitor knowledge, and develop understanding of customer challenges.
Identify and create new opportunities, drive tender/bid process, and contribute to account plans.
Collaborate with subject matter experts and resources within the company.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or 5 years of sales experience in the healthcare industry
